attributes.action: Prohibit Gordon Brown from becomming Prime Minister unless he is fairly elected by the British public in a general election..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Will Gordon Brown be the next Prime Minister? According to the media and judging By Mr Browns actions its a foregone conclusion.In the interests of something called 'Democracy' heres your chance to petition for a general election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
